column6: The philosophy of Apocalypse has always been "let the fittest survive," but by its ultimate extension, that would only leave one person standing! As mutants fall from the shocking release of a devastating plague, who will live and who will die? And if Apocalypse falls, who will rule in his place...?
column8: | artist:Iban Coello | writer:Fabian Nicieza | penciller (cover):Gerardo Sandoval
